instructions:
Fry the salted and peppered potatoes in oil over medium heat for 3 minutes, then turn to low and continue
frying for an additional 7 minutes turning so as not to burn. Add Kielbasa and continue frying and turning
for an additional 8 minutes.
Stir Red-Hot and Worcestershire into whisked eggs and prepare as scrambled eggs in a separate frying
pan. Chop eggs and add to potatoes and heat for a minute to combine flavors. Serves 2. 
*(Rev. 10/21/93)*
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups Ore Ida O'Brien frozen potatoes
1/3 lb Kielbasa sausage, quartered lengthwise and sliced 1/4 inch thick
name: Eggs O'brien
creator: Jim Decker
